Form-message

Use a form message to add labels, annotations or error messages to your forms.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-form-message

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-form-message

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-form-message/src/scss/form-message";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Form label

A form label provides information on the type of content that should be filled in. Always put the label above the form element. Don't use a colon (:) after a label. The link between the label and the input field is visually clear.

      <label class="vl-form__label"
    for="name"
  >
    Naam evenement
  </label>

Form label (light)

A form label provides information on the type of content that should be filled in. Always put the label above the form element. Don't use a colon (:) after a label. The link between the label and the input field is visually clear.

      <label class="vl-form__label
    vl-form__label--light"
    for="name"
  >
    Naam evenement
  </label>

Form label (block)

A form label provides information on the type of content that should be filled in. Always put the label above the form element. Don't use a colon (:) after a label. The link between the label and the input field is visually clear.

      <label class="vl-form__label
    vl-form__label--block"
    for="name"
  >
    Naam evenement
  </label>

Form annotation

A short description that gives extra instructions about the content that needs to be added to a form element.

De naam van het evenement moet minstens 12 karakters tellen.

      <p class="vl-form__annotation">De naam van het evenement moet minstens 12 karakters tellen.</p>

Form error

The error message provides useful feedback about an incorrect or empty form element.

Het veld 'Naam evenement' is een verplicht veld.

      <p class="vl-form__error">Het veld &#39;Naam evenement&#39; is een verplicht veld.</p>

Form success

The success message provides useful feedback about a correct form element.

Het veld 'Naam evenement' is correct ingevuld. 

      <p class="vl-form__success">
    Het veld &#39;Naam evenement&#39; is correct ingevuld.
    <span class="vl-vi vl-vi-check" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </p>

Accessibility

Always connect labels to input elements with "for" and "id" attributes. Optionally, connect form errors and annotations to the input fields using "id" and "aria-describedby" attributes. This ensures that screenreader users don't miss any information when the input receives focus.
